lines.text: Nakedness is simplicity itself, like the sun, the water...
I'm afraid of everything - birds, storms, lifts, needles - and now, this great fear of death...
Everybody spoils me. Nobody loves me.
I'm sorry I'm leaving. I'd like to be with you.
You are. I think my fear is gone. I think I'm happy.
Ugliness is a kind of death... As long as I'm beautiful,I'm alive more than others.
You seem to be waiting for something, rather than someone.
I saw a man piercing his arm. It made me feel sick. what a day. I feel out of it.
